Name: Sort and Verify Failed Executions in Team Project
Description: Navigate to team project executions, sort by ID ascending, check failed executions, and verify the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*/executions/*
Step 2: Click on button SortIDAscending
Step 3: Click on span StartedAscending
Step 4: Click on div failedExecutions (FailedED) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Project Execution Link in Team Project
Description: Navigate to team project executions and verify the project execution link.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*/executions
Step 2: Click on link ProjectExecution
Step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Access Executions Link in Team Project Detail
Description: Navigate to team project details, access executions link, and verify the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*/*
Step 2: Click on link Executions
Step 3: Click on link Executions -> Navigate to page ''
Step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: View Test Run Details in Team Project
Description: Access team project details, view test run details multiple times, and verify the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*/*
Step 2: Click on div testRunDetails (ParallelSuite)
Step 3: Click on div testRunDetails (ParallelSuite2)
Step 4: Click on div testRunDetails (ParallelSuite3) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Navigate and Review Failed Execution Thumbnails
Description: Explore failed executions, review thumbnail images, and navigate back to the team project executions page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*/executions/*
Step 2: Click on div FailedCreateReverse
Step 3: Click on div failedQueries (FailedQuery)
Step 4: Click on div failedQueries (FailedFilterClaims)
Step 5: Click on div ThumbnailImage
Step 6: Click on button close
Step 7: Click on div ThumbnailImage2
Step 8: Click on div failedExecutions (FailedCreateReverse2)
Step 9: Click on div ThumbnailImage3
Step 10: Click on div PreviewMessage
Step 11: Click on button close
Step 12: Click on pre ElementClickIntercepted
Step 13: Click on div ThumbnailImage
Step 14: Click on image FileImage
Step 15: Click on button Close -> Navigate to page 'organization home#organization/*/home'
Step 16: Click on link ExecutionDetails -> Navigate to page 'team project executions#team/*/project/*/executions/*'
Step 17: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Access Test Results and Verify Home Page
Description: Navigate to team project details, access test results actions, and verify the home page after checking test run details.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to team/*/project/*/*
Step 2: Click on header TestRunDetail
Step 3: Click on button testResultsActions (Sessions)
Step 4: Click on div TotalTests
Step 5: Click on i SolidIcon
Step 6: Click on button testResultsActions (FailedTestResults)
Step 7: Click on button testResultsActions (Sessions)
Step 8: Click on button testResultsActions (Sessions2)
Step 9: Click on div TotalTests
Step 10: Click on div TestRunDetail
Step 11: Click on button CloseButton
Step 12: Click on div testRunDetails (TestRunCell)
Step 13: Click on div NoDataDisplay -> Navigate to page ''
Step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
